templates.template: style ${name} { description = "describe your element here" transparency = 0.0 background-color = white line-color = black line-style = solid line-width = 1 font-color = black font-name = "Arial" font-size = 8 font-bold = no font-italic = no }

template.description: insert a default style that extend another
template.name: styleDefaultExtend

templates.template: style ${name} extends ${superStyle} { description = "describe your element here" transparency = 0.0 background-color = white line-color = black line-style = solid line-width = 1 font-color = black font-name = "Arial" font-size = 8 font-bold = no font-italic = no }
